fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content

Class StringTemplateContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content.TemplateContent
      • fr.sii.ogham.core.message.content.StringTemplateContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Content

    public class StringTemplateContent
extends TemplateContent

    Content that contains a template. The template contains variables. The template will be evaluated with the provided context (variable values).

    This is a shortcut to: 
     new TemplateContent("string:<template content>", context);
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StringTemplateContent(String template, Context context)
      Initialize the content with the template and the context.
      StringTemplateContent(String template, Object bean)
      Shortcut for directly using any object as source for variable substitutions.
